fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sacrifice a Neutral player to haunt another player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sacrificing a Neutral player deals an Overkill attack to them and allows you to deal an Unstoppable attack to your second target
- If you attempt to sacrifice a non-Neutral player, You will sacrifice yourself instead. You may also choose to sacrifice yourself normally
- If you kill a Neutral player with your haunt, you can only sacrifice yourself for the rest of the game
- You cannot sacrifice someone more than one time, if you were to be made able to use your ability multiple times at once by any means
- Your last will will always read "I hate this game"
